DOC.brief_title: Anastrozole Monotherapy Versus Maximal Oestrogen Blockade With Anastrozole Fulvestrant Combination Therapy
DOC.criteria: Signed informed consent , postmenopausal female , histological cytological confirm oestrogene and/or progesterone ( PgR ) receptor positive breast cancer , local recurrence metastasis Previous systemic endocrine therapy advance recurrent disease ; prior fulvestrant therapy Premenopausal woman
